description: If your kids love Robots and the sounds they make, then this is the app for them! There are 11 spots to press on this Robot, and each one will make a different Robot related sound. Also you'll get a little vibration for more excitement! Your child will love it. Great way to keep them busy when they are bored. It runs full screen so you don't have to worry about them accidentally clicking other things. Kid tested and approved!
